item.title: Powershell Accelerator
item.description: ACCELERATOR .NET CLASS [adsi] System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry [adsisearcher] System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher [Alias] System.Management.Automation.AliasAttribute [AllowEmptyCollection] System.Management.Automation.AllowEmptyCollectionAttribute [AllowEmptyString] System.Management.Automation.AllowEmptyStringAttribute [AllowNull] System.Management.Automation.AllowNullAttribute [array] System.Array [bigint] System.Numerics.BigInteger [bool] System.Boolean [byte] System.Byte [char] System.Char [cimclass] Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.CimClass [cimconverter] Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.CimConverter [ciminstance] Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.CimInstance [cimtype] Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.CimType [CmdletBinding] System.

item.title: NTFS Inheritance & Propagation Flags & Combinations
item.description: Inheritance Flags Inheritance Flag Meaning ContainerInherit Propagate to child containers (directories). None Do not propagate this permission to any child containers or objects. ObjectInherit Propagate to child objects (files). Propagation Flags The default Windows behavior is None. Setting this flag to InheritOnly will cause the access rule to only apply to child objects of the container.

item.title: NTFS Basic & Special Permissions
item.description: Basic Permissions Permission Rights Granted FullControl Specifies the right to exert full control over a folder or file, and to modify access control and audit rules. This value represents the right to do anything with a file and is the combination of all rights in this enumeration. Modify Specifies the right to read, write, list folder contents, delete folders and files, and run application files.

item.title: Powershell Operators
item.description: Comparison Operators Operator Comparison -eq equals -ne not equals -gt greater than -ge greater than or equal -lt less than -le less than or equal -like string matches wildcard pattern -notlike string does not match wildcard pattern -match string matches regex pattern -notmatch string does not match regex pattern -replace replaces strings matching a regex pattern -contains collection contains a value -notcontains collection does not contain a value -in value is in a collection -notin value is not in a collection -is both objects are the same type -isnot the objects are not the same type Logical Operators Operator Comparison -and Logical AND.

item.title: [PS Snippet] Adding leading zero
item.description: Adding leading zero with -f operator. 2..20 | foreach {'Folder_{0:D2}' -f $_}

item.title: [PS Snippet] Find Last Reboot
item.description: Find the last reboot. Get-EventLog -LogName System -ComputerName $Env:COMPUTERNAME | Where-Object { $_.eventid -eq '1074' } | sort -Descending -Property timegenerated | Select-Object -First 1 -Property MachineName, Username, timegenerate

item.title: [PS Snippet] Remove Leading Null From IP Address
[PS Snippet] Restore Default Powershell Gallery Repository
item.description: This will restore the default repository Register-PSRepository -Default

item.title: Active Directory Port Requirements
item.description: The following table lists the port requirements for establishing DC to DC communication in all versions of Windows Sever beginning with Windows Server 2003. Type Port Protocol LDAP 389 TCP/UDP LDAP SSL 636 TCP LDAP GC 3268 TCP LDAP GC SSL 3269 TCP Kerberos 88 TCP/UDP DNS 53 TCP/UDP SMB,CIFS,SMB2, DFSN, LSARPC, NbtSS, NetLogonR, SamR, SrvSvc 445 TCP/UDP SMTP 25 TCP RPC, EPM 135 TCP RPC, DCOM, EPM, DRSUAPI, NetLogonR, SamR, FRS TCP Dynamic RPC, DFSR (SYSVOL) 5722 TCP Windows Time 123 UDP Kerberos change/set password 464 TCP/UDP DFSN, NetLogon, NetBIOS Datagram Service 138 UDP SOAP 9389 TCP DHCP, MADCAP 67, 2535 UDP NetLogon, NetBIOS Name Resolution 137 UDP DFSN, NetBIOS Session Service, NetLogon 139 TCP Referenc: https://docs.

item.title: [PS Snippet] Monitor the latest changes of a file (tail equivalent)
item.description: Get-Content -Path C:\Windows\System32\dhcp\DhcpSrvLog-fri.log -Tail 20 -Wait -tail will display the latest 20 lines of the file and -wait to see updates in real time.

item.title: [PS Snippet] Get system uptime
item.description: Get system uptime, the elapsed time since last restart. [Timespan]::FromMilliseconds([Environment]::TickCount)

item.title: [PS Snippet] Get RAM
item.description: Get total size of RAM installed. [Math]::Round((Get-WmiObject -Class Win32_ComputerSystem).TotalPhysicalMemory/1GB)

item.title: [PS Snippet] Get Current User and Machine
[PS Snippet] Difference Between Break and Continue
item.description: The difference between break and continue. break exit a loop or switch statement. continue continue but skips the current iteration. switch (2,4,5) { 1 {"One"} 2 {"Two"; continue} 3 {"Three"} 4 {"Four"; break} 5 {"Five"} } Output Two Four

item.title: DHCP Server Event IDs
item.description: Event ID Description 00 The log was started. 01 The log was stopped. 02 The log was temporarily paused due to low disk space. 10 A new IP address was leased to a client. 11 A lease was renewed by a client. 12 A lease was released by a client. 13 An IP address was found in use on the network.

item.title: [PS Snippet] Convert String to DateTime
item.description: Convert a string to a date-time object. [Datetime]::ParseExact('02/04/1984', 'MM/dd/yyyy', $null)

item.title: User Account Control
item.description: PROPERTYFLAG HEXADECIMAL DECIMAL SCRIPT 0x0001 1 ACCOUNTDISABLE 0x0002 2 HOMEDIR_REQUIRED 0x0008 8 LOCKOUT 0x0010 16 PASSWD_NOTREQD 0x0020 32 PASSWD_CANT_CHANGE 0x0040 64 ENCRYPTED_TEXT_PWD_ALLOWED 0x0080 128 TEMP_DUPLICATE_ACCOUNT 0x0100 256 NORMAL_ACCOUNT 0x0200 512 INTERDOMAIN_TRUST_ACCOUNT 0x0800 2048 WORKSTATION_TRUST_ACCOUNT 0x1000 4096 SERVER_TRUST_ACCOUNT 0x2000 8192 DONT_EXPIRE_PASSWORD 0x10000 65536 MNS_LOGON_ACCOUNT 0x20000 131072 SMARTCARD_REQUIRED 0x40000 262144 TRUSTED_FOR_DELEGATION 0x80000 524288 NOT_DELEGATED 0x100000 1048576 USE_DES_KEY_ONLY 0x200000 2097152 DONT_REQ_PREAUTH 0x400000 4194304 PASSWORD_EXPIRED 0x800000 8388608 TRUSTED_TO_AUTH_FOR_DELEGATION 0x1000000 16777216 PARTIAL_SECRETS_ACCOUNT 0x04000000 67108864
